item.title: About
item.description: Hey! I’am Mazen Maliyakkal, I’m 22 years old and currently working as a Software Engineer at Accubits Technologies Inc. Skills: NodeJS, ExpressJS, Postgres, ReactJS, MongoDB, MySQL, Git Work Experience Accubits Technologies Inc. | Software Engineer | July 2021 - Present Main developer for a decentralized task management tool - Taskdapp Developed frontend for excel2web - a tool to convert spreadsheet files to a database.
